alert.note: Alert for Middle Tanana Valley; Upper Tanana Valley and the Fortymile Country (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 10 at 4:11PM AKDT until August 10 at 4:45PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM AKDT FOR NORTHWESTERN UPPER TANANA VALLEY AND THE FORTYMILE COUNTRY AND EASTERN MIDDLE TANANA VALLEY... At 410 PM AKDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 29 miles east of Pleasant Valley, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Upper Tanana Valley and the Fortymile Country and eastern Middle Tanana Valley. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Middle Tanana Valley; Upper Tanana Valley and the Fortymile Country
